INTRODUCTION Digital Gold (DG) is a versatile payment-type cryptocurrency and its value is based on gold mine business. This project adopts a rapid online payment function with resource development as the source of asset value and with small risk of foreign exchange fluctuations and revitalizes existing market economy.  It is a project aimed at revitalizing the markets in various countries around the world and developing new markets by using unique financial platforms created on electronic terminals. This currency will also commit to promote gold mining businesses around the world including Japan and to preserve the environment. Procurement funds are used to create a stable settlement environment based on virtual currency and to improve the global level of mining business with strict environmental standards.  The first attempt to link the real economy and Digital Gold will be done in the international free communication application BEAT, which is developing in our group. BEAT application plans to use Digital Gold as a settlement currency of online contents such as games, movies, etc. besides motion comic as of original products.  In addition, at the time of settlement, we offer wallet which can exchange immediately between Digital Gold for settlement which price fixed with statutory currency and original Digital Gold. We plan to distribute the highly flexible Wallet SDK so that any company forming an online market can use it as a settlement currency.  ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________    ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________   HOW IT WORKS? Decentralized, Secure, Smart Payment Platform Developing a seamless solution for decentralized economy services.      Real time conversion system from DG to USD-DG (USD pegged DG, only for payment use) in our original wallet. The remittance completed within 3 seconds and 10,000 tps capacity.       No longer need multiple work for sign in. Digital Gold platform is planning to offers one-touch Sign in system with highly secured biometrics after once requiring strict KYC information.       The basic policy of DG is safety and ease of use as the top priority. Hash power is distributed and managed by carefully selected consortium members who prioritize the benefits of the entire ecosystem.      When making important remittances, let's mutually approve remittance contents before remitting to the wrong address and disappearing the DG.       DG summarizes the proposal on new product development and creates a voting place using DG. Anyone can commit to the development of high quality products.        By using DG, international remittance can be safely and immediately executed with low fee. We plan to distribute the Wallet SDK which can change the setting according to the style of each company.   The main purpose of Digital Gold is to be a way of global economy connection which can be used safely and easily.  As Digital Gold are planning to not only listed in some exchange, preparing some original exchanges. By joining Digital Gold economical zone, such as BEAT app, we can send a funds and information instantly even among Africa, the US, Europe and Asia. The first approach for making global economy should be online contents such as movie, game, electronic comic that can be stream as a information but we are planning global goods trading by connecting more than 100 companies as a secondary approach. Furthermore, the third approach is project voting by Digital Gold, it will be a business type crowdfunding platform.   We aim to be a massive transaction whch is trusted by developing the biometrics authorization and semi-automatical strict management systems of KYC information and processing services at a fraction of the market prices.Better security level will be achieved by reliable companies or individuals offering IT resourses data centers, business computers, and personal users and utilizing their storage capacities and their processors. Moreover, original consensus algolithm causes more than 10,000 tps, within 3 seconds remittance.   Digital Gold spread to real economy service in global market.    ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________  Economic scale of Digital Gold  The Digital Ｇold economic zone is based on the real economy assuming that it will be utilized as international means of settlement in a wide variety of industries across the world.  With the BEAT application, which is being developed as a platform for online contents, by collecting over 10 million people internationally for users over three years by distributing manga videos, games, movies, music, etc., applying for company accounts It is possible to list our products in Digital Gold Economic Area.  For companies that adopt Digital Gold as a means of settlement at their own sales sites and stores, we are preparing to distribute the Wallet SDK that can be flexibly customized with the aim of achieving the end of the year, and about 100 companies in the Digital Gold economy I will encourage them to participate.  By the time the target value is reached there is the possibility that more than 1 billion people will form a market economy of the trillion-dollar scale.  ________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________  COIN SALE    Stay this thread for regular updates and join us on our official support in Telegram for the most immediate updates.
